main event: On October 2, 1955, a witness reported seeing a luminous object in the sky over Poughkeepsie, New York.
interesting points: The object was brighter than a shooting star and had a blue-white color,The sighting lasted approximately 55 seconds,The object exhibited a parallel drop for about 10 seconds with an estimated velocity of 350 mph,The witness was lying in bed and noticed the object when glancing up,Insufficient data led to the conclusion that it might have been a balloon or aircraft.
witness description: The witness was a 33-year-old male civilian captain, previously with military training.
